backend/main.mo: Motoko backend storing reminders, wellness logs, exercise logs, and user profiles with access‑controlled CRUD operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, descriptions, affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted list of short summaries for all frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS theme file defining light/dark design tokens and global base styles.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML page setting metadata and mounting the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app orchestrating auth, profile setup, navigation, and view rendering.
frontend/src/components/EmptyState.tsx: Reusable empty‑state component with icon, message, and optional action.
frontend/src/components/LoadingState.tsx: Skeleton-based loading placeholder component with adjustable rows.
frontend/src/features/auth/AuthLanding.t: Marketing landing page introducing Alex Health with hero content and login CTA.
frontend/src/features/auth/ProfileSetupD: Dialog for entering and saving a user's name during initial profile setup using a mutation hook.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/Dashboar: Displays weekly exercise metrics and today's workouts using fetched logs and derived statistics.
frontend/src/features/dates/DatePickerCo: Provides a popover date picker with a quick 'Today' button to change the selected date.
frontend/src/features/dates/dateUtils.ts: Utility functions for converting dates to bigint timestamps and generating date ranges.
frontend/src/features/exercise/exerciseM: Calculates aggregate exercise metrics such as total minutes, workout count, active days, and average intensity.
frontend/src/features/layout/AppLayout.t: Main app layout with navigation, user greeting, logout handling, and reminder banner wrapper.
frontend/src/features/logging/DailyLogsV: Shows daily exercise and wellness logs for a selected date with tabbed categories and a date picker.
frontend/src/features/logging/ExerciseLo: Form dialog to add or edit an exercise log, validating inputs and submitting via mutation hooks.
Displays exercise logs for a day with add, edit, and delete actions using a form modal.
frontend/src/features/logging/WellnessLo: Form modal for creating or editing wellness logs with category-specific labels and mutation handling.
Shows wellness logs for a category with options to add, edit, or delete entries via a form.
frontend/src/features/progress/ExerciseC: Builds a bar chart of daily exercise minutes over a 7- or 30-day range using Recharts.
frontend/src/features/progress/ProgressV: Main progress dashboard with range selection and tabs for exercise, hydration, and sleep charts.
frontend/src/features/progress/WellnessC: Placeholder wellness chart that displays static guidance text for category trends.
frontend/src/features/reminders/DueRemin: Shows active due reminders as dismissible alerts, resetting dismissals daily.
frontend/src/features/reminders/Reminder: Form modal for creating or editing reminders, including title, category, and scheduled time.
Renders a list of reminders with controls to toggle active status, edit, or delete, and opens an edit form when needed.
Displays the reminders page, fetching reminders and showing loading, empty, or list states, with a button to open the creation form.
frontend/src/features/reminders/reminder: Provides a utility to determine if a reminder is due within the last 30 minutes on the current day.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an authentication context using Internet Identity, handling login, stored identities, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for CRUD operations on user profiles, reminders, and wellness logs using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes with custom color tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, supporting both query strings and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom colors, extended theme settings, animations, and typography/container/animate plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project state metadata and lists existing features for an ICP wellness/fitness app including auth, dashboard, logs, reminders, progress, layout, and build tooling.
